bwwExcerpt: Twenty-five years after its Tony- and Pulitzer-winning first Broadway run, the scope and richness of the seven-hour, two-part saga - the taut "Millennium Approaches," followed by the somewhat messier "Perestroika" - remain as impressive as ever.
